original_text:
About Naphtali he said:
“Naphtali is abounding with the favor of the Lord
    and is full of his blessing;
    he will inherit southward to the lake.”
korean_text: 납달리에 대하여는 일렀으되 은혜가 풍성하고 여호와의 복이 가득한 납달리여 너는 서쪽과 남쪽을 차지할지로다

sentences.original_text: Naphtali is abounding with the favor of the Lord
and is full of his blessing;
he will inherit southward to the lake.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 호수쪽 남쪽을 기업으로 얻을 것입니다.
